blogs.title: FCC approves direct-to-smartphone regulatory framework
blogs.summary: U.S. regulators have approved ground rules for allowing SpaceX and other satellite operators to use radio waves from terrestrial mobile partners to keep smartphone users connected outside cell tower coverage.

blogs.title: Sierra Space developing dual-use spacecraft with military potential
blogs.summary: With a $1.3 billion defense backlog, the company is eyeing opportunities for in-orbit services and transportation vehicles

blogs.title: SpaceX successful in epic third Starship test launch
blogs.summary: SpaceX was successful in its third test flight of the largest rocket ever as Starship took to the skies at 8:25 am...

blogs.title: SpaceX Scores Many Successes on Third Starship Test Flight
blogs.summary: SpaceX is still collecting and analyzing data from the third Starship test flight, but it is clear it scored many successes. They may have lost Starship over the Indian Ocean, […]

blogs.title: Starship lifts off on third test flight
blogs.summary: SpaceX’s Starship vehicle lifted off on its third test flight March 14, making significant progress compared to its first two.

blogs.title: SpaceX’s Starship notches major flight test milestones, breaks up over Indian Ocean in final moments
blogs.summary: SpaceX launched the third test flight of its Starship rocket on Thursday and reached space, as the company pushed development of the mammoth vehicle past new milestones.
